selections.name: Owsla Flag
selections.reason: Most consistent runner in the field with recent ratings of 50 and 45. Ideally placed to strike.

selections.name: Luisa
selections.reason: Solid form prior to last start; rating of 50 two starts back puts her right in the mix.

selections.name: Pick And Roll
selections.reason: Ran 2nd two starts back with a competitive figure. Can bounce back from a poor last outing.

selections.name: Ben Hur
selections.reason: Capable of hitting the board on best form; 4th three starts back.

danger_horse.name: Luisa
danger_horse.reason: Has the class to challenge the top pick if she returns to her December form.

selections.name: Golden Oja
selections.reason: Consistent performer with ratings in the 60s. Won two starts back and drawn the rail.

selections.name: Hakaishin
selections.reason: Posted a strong 65 rating last start. Wide draw allows for a clear run home.

selections.name: Nansei Scorpion
selections.reason: Runner-up last time out with a solid 57 figure. Must be included.

selections.name: Gold Talisman
selections.reason: Forgive last run; 2nd two starts back shows true ability.

danger_horse.name: Hakaishin
danger_horse.reason: Recent speed figure matches the top pick and finishes strong.

selections.name: Nobishiro
selections.reason: Drops back to preferred sprint distance after a failed mile attempt. Previous 6f form is winning caliber.

selections.name: Ka Noa Lady
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd place finish with a 60 rating. In good form.

selections.name: Mikinokarakuribako
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran a solid 4th last time out. Always around the mark.

selections.name: Shosan Rex
selections.reason: Second run back from a spell; likely improver.

danger_horse.name: Ka Noa Lady
danger_horse.reason: Recent form is arguably the most consistent in the field.

selections.name: Toiro
selections.reason: Dominant debut winner by 5 lengths with a 68 rating. Looks a class above.

selections.name: Tsukaino Tori
selections.reason: Won last start with a 64 rating. The clear main danger.

selections.name: Aurore Ciel
selections.reason: Runner-up last start with a career-best 66 rating. Improving.

selections.name: Dear More
selections.reason: Consistent enough to fill the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Tsukaino Tori
danger_horse.reason: Only other horse with a comparable recent speed figure.

selections.name: Wild Nobukun
selections.reason: Won two starts back. Best of a weak bunch on paper.

selections.name: Kuro Chadal
selections.reason: Ran 4th last start and has shown flashes of ability.

selections.name: Canterbury Time
selections.reason: Mid-pack finisher who could improve in this company.

selections.name: Nijiiro Pikal
selections.reason: Resuming from a break but has shown early speed previously.

selections.name: Baleares
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick. Won last two with ratings of 66 and 64. Top form.

selections.name: Genie Kic
selections.reason: Won two starts back with a 67 rating. Forgive last run.

selections.name: Grass Greed
selections.reason: Ran 4th last start and has been consistent.

selections.name: Thalberg
selections.reason: Winner three starts back, capable of bouncing back.

danger_horse.name: Genie Kic
danger_horse.reason: Has a peak rating higher than the favorite's recent average.

selections.name: Alma Venus
selections.reason: Coming off a win with a solid 62 rating. Outside draw suits.

selections.name: Nijino Kanatani
selections.reason: 3rd last start and a winner before that. Consistent figures.

selections.name: Burmese Ruby
selections.reason: Won two starts back. Rail draw is the only concern.

selections.name: Tagano Sadaf
selections.reason: Capable on his day, worth including in exotics.

danger_horse.name: Nijino Kanatani
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent and maps well from the middle gate.

selections.name: Bellwood Bravo
selections.reason: Class dropper with superior past ratings (77, 87). Should outclass this field.

selections.name: Lampron
selections.reason: Consistent type who rarely runs a bad race. Solid place chance.

selections.name: Miracle Voice
selections.reason: Has high peak ability but recent form is patchy. Dangerous if right.

selections.name: Justinian
selections.reason: Best of the rest, likely to be running on.

danger_horse.name: Miracle Voice
danger_horse.reason: If he returns to his 70+ rating form, he wins.

selections.name: Aqua Jet
selections.reason: Model of consistency with ratings of 67, 69, 70. The one to beat.

selections.name: Yes With Can
selections.reason: 3rd last start and maps to get a good run from the inside.

selections.name: Gloire Sky
selections.reason: Winner two starts back. 5th last time was respectable.

selections.name: Lovely Lucia
selections.reason: Runner-up last start, showing improvement.

danger_horse.name: Yes With Can
danger_horse.reason: Proven at this level and drawn to save ground.

selections.name: G T God
selections.reason: Last start winner with a 67 rating. Wide draw is a plus at this distance.

selections.name: Traumerei
selections.reason: On a winning streak (2 in a row). Ratings 63, 62. Major player.

selections.name: Critical Hit
selections.reason: Consistent 3rd last start with a 66 rating.

selections.name: Heishirin
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last time out, always competitive.

danger_horse.name: Traumerei
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is the best form; hard to knock a horse chasing a hat-trick.

selections.name: Penny Fountain
selections.reason: Last start winner with a strong 65 rating. Looks progressive.

selections.name: Princess Daisy
selections.reason: Also a last start winner with a 66 rating. Rail draw is the only slight negative.

selections.name: Pharma D'or
selections.reason: Ignore last run; previous form was winning caliber.

selections.name: Boat Racer
selections.reason: 3rd last start, consistent enough to hit the board.

danger_horse.name: Princess Daisy
danger_horse.reason: Matching speed figures to the top pick.

selections.name: Satono Empire
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and a winner before that. Ratings 62, 67 are top tier here.

selections.name: Best Leon
selections.reason: 2nd last start with improving figures (47 -> 59 -> 62).

selections.name: Auto Bianchi
selections.reason: Winner two starts back. Can bounce back from a midfield finish.

selections.name: Meiner Aegis
selections.reason: Capable of better than recent form suggests.

danger_horse.name: Best Leon
danger_horse.reason: On a clear upward trajectory with ratings.
